verses.verse: דְּבַר־ <WH1697> The word יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הָיָ֗ה <WH1961> came אֶל־ <WH413> about מִיכָה֙ <WH4318> that came to Micah הַמֹּ֣רַשְׁתִּ֔י <WH4183> the Morasthite בִּימֵ֥י <WH3117> in the days יוֹתָ֛ם <WH3147> of Jotham אָחָ֥ז <WH271> Ahaz יְחִזְקִיָּ֖ה <WH2396> Hezekiah מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> kings יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which חָזָ֥ה <WH2372> which he saw עַל־ <WH5921> concerning שֹׁמְר֖וֹן <WH8111> concerning Samaria וִירֽוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> and Jerusalem

שִׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> Hear עַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> all ye people כֻּלָּ֔ם <WH3605> all הַקְשִׁ֖יבִי <WH7181> hearken אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> O earth וּמְלֹאָ֑הּ <WH4393> and all that therein וִיהִי֩ <WH1961> become אֲדֹנָ֨י <WH136> is and let the Lord יְהוִ֤ה <WH3069> GOD בָּכֶם֙ לְעֵ֔ד <WH5707> be witness אֲדֹנָ֖י <WH136> against you the Lord מֵהֵיכַ֥ל <WH1964> temple קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6944> from his holy

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> For behold the LORD יֹצֵ֣א <WH3318> cometh forth מִמְּקוֹמ֑וֹ <WH4725> out of his place וְיָרַ֥ד <WH3381> and will come down וְדָרַ֖ךְ <WH1869> and tread עַל־ <WH5921> and [בָּמֹותֵי כ] (בָּ֥מֳתֵי <WH1116> height ק) אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

וְנָמַ֤סּוּ <WH4549> shall be molten הֶֽהָרִים֙ <WH2022> And the mountains תַּחְתָּ֔יו <WH8478> under וְהָעֲמָקִ֖ים <WH6010> under him and the valleys יִתְבַּקָּ֑עוּ <WH1234> shall be cleft כַּדּוֹנַג֙ <WH1749> as wax מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הָאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> the fire כְּמַ֖יִם <WH4325> [and] as the waters מֻגָּרִ֥ים <WH5064> [that are] poured בְּמוֹרָֽד׃ <WH4174> down a steep place

בְּפֶ֤שַׁע <WH6588> For the transgression יַֽעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> of Jacob כָּל־ <WH3605> All זֹ֔את <WH2063> and for וּבְחַטֹּ֖אות <WH2403> [is] all this and for the sins בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel מִֽי־ <WH4310> What פֶ֣שַׁע <WH6588> What [is] the transgression יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> of Jacob הֲלוֹא֙ <WH3808> not שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <WH8111> Samaria וּמִי֙ <WH4310> What בָּמ֣וֹת <WH1116> is the high יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> Judah הֲל֖וֹא <WH3808> not יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> Jerusalem

וְשַׂמְתִּ֥י <WH7760> Therefore I will make שֹׁמְר֛וֹן <WH8111> Samaria לְעִ֥י <WH5856> as an heap הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> of the field לְמַטָּ֣עֵי <WH4302> [and] as plantings כָ֑רֶם <WH3754> of a vineyard וְהִגַּרְתִּ֤י <WH5064> and I will pour down לַגַּי֙ <WH1516> thereof into the valley אֲבָנֶ֔יהָ <WH68> the stones וִיסֹדֶ֖יהָ <WH3247> the foundations אֲגַלֶּֽה׃ <WH1540> and I will discover

וְכָל־ <WH3605> All פְּסִילֶ֣יהָ <WH6456> And all the graven images יֻכַּ֗תּוּ <WH3807> thereof shall be beaten to pieces וְכָל־ <WH3605> All אֶתְנַנֶּ֙יהָ֙ <WH868> and all the hires יִשָּׂרְפ֣וּ <WH8313> thereof shall be burned בָאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> with the fire וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עֲצַבֶּ֖יהָ <WH6091> and all the idols אָשִׂ֣ים <WH7760> thereof will I lay שְׁמָמָ֑ה <WH8077> desolate כִּ֠י <WH3588> for מֵאֶתְנַ֤ן <WH868> [it] of the hire זוֹנָה֙ <WH2181> of an harlot קִבָּ֔צָה <WH6908> for she gathered וְעַד־ <WH5704> and to אֶתְנַ֥ן <WH868> to the hire זוֹנָ֖ה <WH2181> of an harlot יָשֽׁוּבוּ׃ <WH7725> and they shall return

עַל־ <WH5921> Because זֹאת֙ <WH2063> must אֶסְפְּדָ֣ה <WH5594> Therefore I will wail וְאֵילִ֔ילָה <WH3213> and howl אֵילְכָ֥ה <WH1980> go [שִׁילַל כ] (שֹׁולָ֖ל <WH7758> spoiled ק) וְעָר֑וֹם <WH6174> and naked אֶעֱשֶׂ֤ה <WH6213> I will make מִסְפֵּד֙ <WH4553> a wailing כַּתַּנִּ֔ים <WH8577> like the dragons וְאֵ֖בֶל <WH60> and mourning כִּבְנ֥וֹת <WH1323> first יַעֲנָֽה׃ <WH3284> the ostriches

כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אֲנוּשָׁ֖ה <WH605> [is] incurable מַכּוֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH4347> For her wound כִּי־ <WH3588> for בָ֙אָה֙ <WH935> for it is come עַד־ <WH5704> against יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> unto Judah נָגַ֛ע <WH5060> he is come עַד־ <WH5704> against שַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> unto the gate עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> of my people עַד־ <WH5704> to יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> [even] to Jerusalem

בְּגַת֙ <WH1661> ye [it] not at Gath אַל־ <WH408> nay תַּגִּ֔ידוּ <WH5046> Declare בָּכ֖וֹ <WH1058> weep אַל־ <WH408> nay תִּבְכּ֑וּ <WH1058> ye not at all בְּבֵ֣ית לְעַפְרָ֔ה <WH1036> in the house of Aphrah עָפָ֖ר <WH6083> thyself in the dust [הִתְפַּלָּשְׁתִּי כ] (הִתְפַּלָּֽשִׁי׃ <WH6428> roll self ק)

עִבְרִ֥י <WH5674> Pass ye away לָכֶ֛ם יוֹשֶׁ֥בֶת <WH3427> thou inhabitant שָׁפִ֖יר <WH8208> of Saphir עֶרְיָה־ <WH6181> naked בֹ֑שֶׁת <WH1322> having thy shame לֹ֤א <WH3808> does not יָֽצְאָה֙ <WH3318> came not forth יוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> the inhabitant צַֽאֲנָ֔ן <WH6630> of Zaanan מִסְפַּד֙ <WH5594> lament בֵּ֣ית הָאֵ֔צֶל <WH1018> of Bethezel יִקַּ֥ח <WH3947> he shall receive מִכֶּ֖ם <WH4480> at עֶמְדָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH5979> of you his standing

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because חָ֥לָֽה <WH2470> weak לְט֖וֹב <WH2896> for good יוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> For the inhabitant מָר֑וֹת <WH4796> of Maroth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because יָ֤רַד <WH3381> came down רָע֙ <WH7451> but evil מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God לְשַׁ֖עַר <WH8179> unto the gate יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem

רְתֹ֧ם <WH7573> bind הַמֶּרְכָּבָ֛ה <WH4818> the chariot לָרֶ֖כֶשׁ <WH7409> to the swift beast יוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> O thou inhabitant לָכִ֑ישׁ <WH3923> of Lachish רֵאשִׁ֨ית <WH7225> she [is] the beginning חַטָּ֥את <WH2403> of the sin הִיא֙ <WH1931> he לְבַת־ <WH1323> to the daughter צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> of Zion כִּי־ <WH3588> for בָ֥ךְ נִמְצְא֖וּ <WH4672> were found פִּשְׁעֵ֥י <WH6588> for the transgressions יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

לָכֵן֙ <WH3651> Therefore תִּתְּנִ֣י <WH5414> Therefore shalt thou give שִׁלּוּחִ֔ים <WH7964> presents עַ֖ל <WH5921> behalf מוֹרֶ֣שֶׁת גַּ֑ת <WH4182> to Moreshethgath בָּתֵּ֤י <WH1004> the houses אַכְזִיב֙ <WH392> of Achzib לְאַכְזָ֔ב <WH391> [shall be] a lie לְמַלְכֵ֖י <WH4428> to the kings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

עֹ֗ד <WH5750> Moreover הַיֹּרֵשׁ֙ <WH3423> an heir אָ֣בִי <WH935> Yet will I bring לָ֔ךְ יוֹשֶׁ֖בֶת <WH3427> unto thee O inhabitant מָֽרֵשָׁ֑ה <WH4762> of Mareshah עַד־ <WH5704> against עֲדֻלָּ֥ם <WH5725> unto Adullam יָב֖וֹא <WH935> he shall come כְּב֥וֹד <WH3519> the glory יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

קָרְחִ֣י <WH7139> Make thee bald וָגֹ֔זִּי <WH1494> and poll עַל־ <WH5921> of בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> children תַּעֲנוּגָ֑יִךְ <WH8588> thee for thy delicate הַרְחִ֤בִי <WH7337> enlarge קָרְחָתֵךְ֙ <WH7144> thy baldness כַּנֶּ֔שֶׁר <WH5404> as the eagle כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because גָל֖וּ <WH1540> for they are gone into captivity מִמֵּֽךְ׃ <WH4480> at ס
